properties.comment: These are the preamble snippets needed by class CastHandler in this package
properties.entry: (assert (forall ((x U) (t T)) (! (subtype (typeof (cast x t)) t) :pattern ((cast x t))))) (assert (forall ((x U) (t T)) (! (=> (subtype (typeof x) t) (= (cast x t) x)) :pattern ((cast x t)))))
